mapper.select:
select sysPerm.id, sysPerm.parent_id, sysPerm.perm_name, sysPerm.perm_url, sysPerm.delete_flag, sysPerm.create_time, sysPerm.update_time from sys_permission sysPerm where sysPerm.delete_flag = 0
and ( sysPerm.perm_name like '%${ condition.permName }%' or sysPerm.perm_url like '%${ condition.permName }%' )
select count(*) from sys_permission sysPerm where sysPerm.delete_flag = 0

select perm.id, perm.perm_url, sr.id as role_id, sr.role_namey as role_namey from sys_permission perm left join sys_perm_role spr on spr.perm_id = perm.id and spr.delete_flag = 0 left join sys_role sr on sr.id = spr.role_id and sr.delete_flag = 0 where perm.delete_flag = 0

select sysPerm.id, sysPerm.parent_id, sysPerm.perm_name, sysPerm.perm_url, sysPerm.delete_flag, sysPerm.create_time, sysPerm.update_time from sys_permission sysPerm where sysPerm.delete_flag = 0 and sysPerm.perm_url = #{ condition }
select perm.id, perm.perm_url from sys_permission perm where perm.delete_flag = 0
